message.raw:
Fixed window titles
Added BLACS icon to window
Fixed main horizontal splitter resizing poorly on window size change
Ported preferences system over to Qt (note I have not committed the new pythonlib\settings module yet so this won't work if you try and test. If I do it now I would have to fork settings so that it doesn't break gtk BLACS...)
Removed glade files for preferences system
